title: Chermoula Tempeh Bites
process: Warm 1 tbsp olive oil in skillet over medium-high heat. Brown the cubed tempeh on all six sides adding more olive oil as needed.
Boil stock and Chermoula. Then pour 3/4 of the mixture over tempeh in a 2-quart baking dish, cover, and bake for 1-hour.
Remove cover and add remaining Chermoula mixture, bake for 10-minutes.
